detail_desc: Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable, pile-lined hood and zip with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fine-knit, slim-fit trainer socks in a lightweight cotton blend with a ribbed section around the foot for a better fit.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a high collar and hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Partially concealed tab with a button and inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Wrapover funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Suede loafers with decorative studs, open sides and a small, concealed wedge heel. Suede linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft rib-knit with a hole-knit sections at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Coiled plastic hair elastics.
Thin coat in a textured weave with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in an airy brocade weave with a shimmering gold-coloured pattern. Round neckline, a concealed zip at the back and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gathered seam at the front to create a draped effect. Partly lined in satin.

Fine-knit set with a headband and pair of long wrist warmers in a soft cashmere blend. Headband with a decorative knot detail at the front. Wrist warmers with a ribbed shaft and ribbed trim at the bottom.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, fake pockets at the front, real pockets at the back and skinny legs.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with an imitation suede appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and flutter sleeves. One with an all-over print and one with a print motif on the front.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in chunky mesh. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crinkled weave with a frill-trimmed lace yoke and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.

Fully lined cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal front pockets, a fake flap back pocket and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Tapered legs with shaping seams and ribbed hems. Jersey lining.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and pin-tucks on the legs.
Imitation leather hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, loop at the back and a hook and loop tab at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Calf-length skirt in a patterned cotton weave with a high waist and sewn-in wrapover at the front with a wide, flounced trim. Longer at the back with a concealed zip and wide flounced trim at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping viscose weave with a smocked stand-up collar, small opening with a button at the back of the neck and smocked cuffs.

Short dress in an airy, softly draping viscose weave with a gathered, stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a print motif and appliqués at the back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and decorative ties at the waist, a fake fly, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Trainers with a scalloped trim around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Twill insoles and rubber soles.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Trainers in imitation leather with shimmering details. Padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made from partly recycled polyester. Chunky soles.
Set with a pair of braces and a bow tie. Adjustable, elasticated braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Short skirt in a cotton weave. Regular waist with elasticated smocking, and a seam at the hem with a wide broderie anglaise flounce. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft pima cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut coat in soft felted fabric with a faux-fur collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and faux-fur at the cuffs. Satin lining.
Metal earrings in various designs. 22 pairs of studs and 3 pairs of hoops. Size from 0.2 cm to 1.7 cm.

Jeggings in washed, stretch denim made from partly recycled cotton. Regular waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.

Straight-cut blouse in satin with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke with forward-facing shoulder seams and a seam with pleats at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned, double-layered cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Leggings in soft fleece with space for a growing tummy. Elastication at the waist and hems.
Short-sleeved dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins), long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring wrapover hood, long sleeves with stripes down the sides, and a kangaroo pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in soft jersey. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist.

Sandals in imitation leather with glittery details and an appliqué at the top, heel cap with a padded edge and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
3/4-length trousers in jersey with covered elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides of the hem.
A-line blouse in an airy viscose weave with a shirt front and long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal bangles in various designs, one with a pendant.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Loose-fitting, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Chest pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Flip-flops with fabric straps and patterned soles.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered motif on the front, a glittery peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Playsuit in cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and press-studs at the back. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x190 cm.
Cropped top in woven fabric with wide shoulder straps and ties that fasten into a bow at the back. Lined.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Trousers in a softly draping, fine knit with a regular waist with covered elastication and straight, wide legs.

Set with a polo shirt and pair of shorts in soft fabric. Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts in a cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly with a button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a decorative button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a round, deep neckline.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide panel and concealed key pocket.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Longer jacket in a linen and cotton weave with notch lapels, patch front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined.
Top and leggings with a motif. Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and long raglan sleeves. Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Mittens in a soft knit with ribbing at the cuffs. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Soft, non-wired nursing bras in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. Wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Triangular scarves in soft jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with buttons at the top, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. One of the tops has an open chest pocket.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric in a narrow cut at the top with short, thin shoulder straps and deep armholes. Loose-fitting.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and imitation suede heel caps.
Gently flared top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Joggers in soft, washed cotton denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake front pockets, a fake fly and elasticated hems.

Ankle-length boiler suit in cotton twill with a soft finish. Collar, concealed buttons at the top and covered elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Flap chest pockets and diagonal front pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and wide, gently tapered legs.

Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, an opening at the top, tasselled ties and a rounded hem.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Hat in a checked weave with a contrasting colour band. Lined. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck and frilled collar with sewn-in ties. Buttons at the top and short butterfly sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
